document_data.name: ''Elixir of Luck''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Elixirs of luck''''' were [[potion]]s favored by the likes of [[rogue]]s and [[assassin]]s in combat. They could be found in [[Waterdeep]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: An imbiber of an ''elixir of luck'' felt a boost to their confidence and was demonstrably more likely to land a lucky or fatal blow.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Naomlen Girdaur]], a [[dwarf]] rogue and member of the [[Zhentarim]] who worked as an [[adventurer]] on behalf of [[Laeral Silverhand]], the [[Open Lord]] of Waterdeep, during the late 15{{th}} century DR.
